attributes.action: Tie Council Tax to the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To tie council tax to the rate of inflation. My council tax this year is said to be going up by over 4% when my wages are only going up by 2%. This is, according to my employer, the rate of inflation is 2%. This is going to leave me worse off as I'm sure it will for thousands if not millions of others. Once again the MP's that are running our country awarded themselves a pay rise over the rate of inflation if this time only just (bet they have no trouble paying theres)....

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/CouncilTaxRPInd/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
